songs.title: Part Of The Wind
songs.lyrics:
Be a part of this riddle
Take a piece of my soul
Find a place you'll be near
I'll just close my eyes and go

I know you're watching me somewhere
In a place where we all belong
Where the fields say no longer
What is right and what is wrong

Hey
You'll always be
Part of the wind
The light in my home
You'll always have
Part of myself
A piece of my soul
Piece of my soul

Even though you're not here
I know it seems like you're gone
But I feel you my dear
You never left, I've always known

You're my biggest emotion
And you'll be forever long
So go, go, go, just go

Hey
You'll always be
Part of the wind
The light in my home
You'll always have
A part of myself
A piece of my soul
Piece of my soul

You're free from life as it is
Love is all we need
You'll live inside of me
As my sweet memory

Hey
You'll always be
Part of the wind
The light in my home
You'll always have
A part of myself
A piece of my soul
Piece of my soul

A piece of my soul
A piece of my soul
